title: Ticket #3316: Spurious newline in condor_submit output
description:
Reported on htcondor-fw: 

Date: Fri, 9 Nov 2012 14:03:40 -0600
From: Jaime Frey <jfrey@cs.wisc.edu>
To: Condor Flightworthy <condor-fw@cs.wisc.edu>
Subject: [htcondor-fw] condor_submit output

Back in August, the output of condor_submit was changed as part of #3111. A
newline was inserted between "Submitting job(s)" and the series of dots printed
one per job. This week, we discovered that this breaks Bosco, the blahp, and
possibly other systems that submit into Condor.

Was there a reason this change was made? I think we need to undo it.
remarks:
2012-Nov-12 11:38:09 by jfrey:
Code Review

The change looks good. I compared the output to that of Condor 7.8.6 and it matches.
